Package com.soprabanking.ips.repositories

Interface ProposalRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Proposal,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Proposal,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Proposal,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Proposal>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Proposal,​java.lang.Long>
public interface ProposalRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Proposal,​java.lang.Long>
This is the Proposal Repository interface which extends the JpaRepository.It accesses the Proposal model
Author:
mojha
See Also:
Proposal, Team

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals in the database
    org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> findAllByUserIdAndCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc​(java.lang.Long id, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals made by the user whose id is passed in the method in the database
    java.util.List<Proposal> findByTeamsAndCreationDateBetween​(Team team, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals marked to the given team id in the database
    org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> findSliceBy​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    This method is used to find a slice of proposals by a pageable variable for pagination so that our proposals are visible in a stream

  • Method Details

    • findSliceBy

      org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> findSliceBy​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This method is used to find a slice of proposals by a pageable variable for pagination so that our proposals are visible in a stream
      Parameters:
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a slice of proposals by the pagination variable

    • findAllByCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc

      org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> findAllByCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc​(java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals in the database
      Parameters:
      startDate - :the start date from which proposals are shown
      endDate - :the end date till which the proposals are shown
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a slice of all proposals between the given start and end date

    • findAllByUserIdAndCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc

      org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> findAllByUserIdAndCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc​(java.lang.Long id, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals made by the user whose id is passed in the method in the database
      Parameters:
      id - :the user id
      startDate - :the start date from which proposals are shown
      endDate - :the end date till which the proposals are shown
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a slice of all user proposals between the given start and end date

    • findByTeamsAndCreationDateBetween

      java.util.List<Proposal> findByTeamsAndCreationDateBetween​(Team team, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals marked to the given team id in the database
      Parameters:
      team - : Team id
      startDate - :the start date from which proposals are shown
      endDate - :the end date till which the proposals are shown
      pageable - : A pageable type variable to show the proposals in a continuous stream
      Returns:
      a slice of all proposals marked to the team between the given start and end date
